728629f-b.title: Richmond: Broadway - Market Street
728629f-b.text:
Broadway, at the N. E. corner of Aarket
Street, showing Public School No. 18. The
school extends east along the north side of
Market Street (right) to Camnbell Avenue.
About 1910
By kulford Simonson
From P. L, Sperr Collection
(2)
The same, years later.
March 24, 1930
P. L. Sperr
728629f-b.folder: Broadway & Market Street, Staten Island, NY
